extendedInfo.description: âShoot the Moonâ with this classic Hearts card game that is popular around the world. Aces Hearts brings the timeless card game to Android with some extra flare. Play characters like Elouise, Vladmimir, and Drucilla.  Donât remember how to play Hearts or need a refresher? We put in step by step tutorials and 5 levels of difficulty to make Aces Hearts easy and fun for everyone! Fun characters, smooth animations, and great game play make this a card game that youâll enjoy playing over and over on your Android device.â¦â¦â¦ FEATURESâ¦â¦â¦â¢ 10 fun characters to play against.â¢ In-game turn advisor.â¢ 5 difficulty levels. â¢ Many options to customize.â¢ Turn animations off for quick play.â¢ Achievements powered by Google Play game services.â¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device..

reviews.title: Fixed!! Thanks!!
reviews.comment: This used to be my favorite hearts game. On my Galaxy S4 the placement of the cards is all jacked up. I can\'t even see my own cards!!
reviews.author: Ronald Husa

reviews.comment: Lots of fun, and no glitches. I do wish that the cards were a little larger on my Samsung Galaxy S-III, tho. They were easier to see on my HTC Evo.\tSee above
reviews.author: Chuck Tiedje

reviews.title: Intelligent card game
reviews.comment: AI cheats in an expected fashion giving appropriate challenge equal to the difficulty level. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: J Zettel

reviews.title: Would give 5s if remove annoying ads
reviews.comment: Great app, smooth animation,  but annoying with ads which appears in every 60 seconds
reviews.author: Asif ur Rehman Fasih

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: With this update I can play again on my samsung awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Wish you could play with others but still real fun!
reviews.author: Bex P.

reviews.title: Nearly perfect
reviews.comment: This is a great hearts game app, and I play it all the time. I\'m obsessed. I love that all the players have their own style and you quickly learn which ones to watch out for. I only wish that you could view the last trick. That would make it a 5 star app.
reviews.author: En Vee

reviews.title: Classic
reviews.comment: I like it cause its just like the one on the desktop but more graphical and not complicated
reviews.author: jameal brown

reviews.title: Five Star game.
reviews.comment: Find a way to play a card by just tapping it and not have to drag it out of ones hand.

reviews.title: Good

reviews.title: New Problems
reviews.comment: After the latest update the screen size doesn\'t fit my HTC One cutting off my score.  Plus, the playis choppy now & not as smooth as it was before.  Please fix!

reviews.title: Decent design
reviews.comment: I cannot rotate the screen. That\'s the only issue for me. Multiplayer feature would be nice, but based on Spades from this developer, joining games will be sloppy anyway.

reviews.comment: Concrete Software has the BEST Hearts game in the app store!
